page.title: 19LAYER SCHOOL
page.content: {LAYER SCHOOL _}was opened in 1895 with 50 pupils. Today there are 162 children, ages ranging from 5_11. Extension have been built but there is still insufficient room and there are two outside portable classroom. The children wear school uniform in the colours royal blue and grey. The first pupil of the school was Gerald Curtis. He is still alive today and lives near the school. {ABBERTON CHURCH _}St.Andrews _ the church overlooks the reservoir and dates from the 14th century. The Chancel was rebuilt over the ancient foundations in the 19th century. The top of the tower is modern but the three lower stages are 16th century.
